questions.answer: In this alternate timeline, the abacus never evolved beyond its ancient form, and mechanical calculators were never invented
questions.question: What is the persistence of manual computation?

questions.answer: This parallel reality exists where the printing press was invented but electricity was never discovered, leading to steam-powered information age
questions.question: What is mechanical information revolution?

questions.answer: In this timeline divergence, the internet was invented in the 1950s but personal computers were never created, leading to mainframe-only computing
questions.question: What is network-before-desktop computing?

questions.answer: This alternate history features smartphones invented in the 1980s but the world wide web was never created, leading to app-only connectivity
questions.question: What is mobile-without-web revolution?

questions.answer: In this radical timeline shift, quantum computing was achieved in the 1970s but artificial intelligence remained at expert systems level
questions.question: What is quantum-without-AI advancement?
